description: The Hybridizer men's short is the original land-to-water staple for all your unpredictable adventures. The lightweight and breathable blend of fabric is moisture-wicking, soft yet durable, and equally comfortable kicking it on the sand and mixing it up in the waves thanks to the internal drawcord. If you take one short with you on your next adventure, this is it.
name: Prana Hybridizer Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
